name: Help Wanted (itch)
description:
Your mean coworkers have locked you in the office during Christmas as part of their annual prank on the new guy. They've hidden puzzles around the room for you to solve before they'll open the door. Can you escape while there's still time for turkey?

Controls

Mouse and Keyboard:

Move and look: WASD, Arrow keys, and mouse
Select: Left-click or Space
Answer: Numbers 1-4

Gamepad:

Move and look: Analogue sticks
Select: A button
Answer: A, B, X, Y

Credits:

Been - Coding
Mandaaar - Arty person
RagingWhisky - Easter Egg song

Audio
